def one_test():
    n = int(input())
    a = map(int, input().split())
    b = map(int, input().split())
    d = [y - x for (x, y) in zip(a, b)]
    sum_d = sum(d)
    if n == 1:
        return -d[0] if d[0] <= 0 else -1
    if n == 2:
        return abs(d[0]) if sum_d == 0 else -1
    if sum_d % (n - 2):
        return -1
    sum_d //= n - 2
    return sum_d if all((sum_d >= x and (sum_d - x) % 2 == 0 for x in d)) else -1
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    print(one_test())
